System.M_INCR101:
SELECT [ICRATE_TYPE], ( SELECT NAME_NAME FROM M_NAME WHERE M_NAME.NAMECLS_CODE = 'ICRATE' AND M.ICRATE_TYPE = M_NAME.NAME_CODE ) AS ICRATE_NAME,
[LCLS_CODE], ( SELECT LCLS_NAME FROM M_LCLS WHERE M_LCLS.LCLS_CODE = M.LCLS_CODE ) AS LCLS_NAME,
[MCLS_CODE], ( SELECT MCLS_NAME FROM M_MCLS WHERE M_MCLS.MCLS_CODE = M.MCLS_CODE AND M.LCLS_CODE = M_MCLS.LCLS_CODE ) AS MCLS_NAME,
[MATER_CODE], ( SELECT MATER_TNAME FROM M_MATER WHERE M_MATER.MATER_CODE = M.MATER_CODE ) AS MATER_NAME,
[PDMETER_FR], [PDMETER_TO], [LENFR_QTY], [LENTO_QTY], [CONV_QTY], [RATE_QTY], [DEC_PLC], ( SELECT NAME_NAME FROM M_NAME WHERE M_NAME.NAMECLS_CODE = 'DEC_PLC' AND M.DEC_PLC= M_NAME.NAME_CODE
) AS DEC_PLC_NAME,
[FRC_TYPE], ( SELECT NAME_NAME FROM M_NAME WHERE M_NAME.NAMECLS_CODE = 'FRC' AND M.FRC_TYPE = M_NAME.NAME_CODE
) AS FRC_NAME,
[USE_FLG],
[ADD_USER], [ADD_PC], [ADD_DATE], [ADD_TIME], [LASTUP_USER], [LASTUP_PC], [LASTUP_DATE], [LASTUP_TIME]
FROM M_INCR AS M
ORDER BY ICRATE_NAME, LCLS_NAME, MCLS_NAME, MATER_NAME
System.M_INCR102: SELECT NAME_NAME, NAME_CODE, DEFAULT_TYPE FROM M_NAME WHERE M_NAME.NAMECLS_CODE = 'ICRATE' ORDER BY DSPORDER_NO, NAME_CODE
System.M_INCR103: SELECT NAME_NAME, NAME_CODE, DEFAULT_TYPE FROM M_NAME WHERE M_NAME.NAMECLS_CODE = 'FRC' ORDER BY DSPORDER_NO, NAME_CODE
System.M_INCR105: DELETE FROM M_INCR WHERE ICRATE_TYPE = ? AND LCLS_CODE = ? AND MCLS_CODE = ? AND MATER_CODE = ? AND PDMETER_FR = ? AND PDMETER_TO = ? AND LENFR_QTY = ? AND LENTO_QTY = ?
System.M_INCR106:
SELECT [ICRATE_TYPE], ( SELECT NAME_NAME FROM M_NAME WHERE M_NAME.NAMECLS_CODE = 'ICRATE' AND M.ICRATE_TYPE = M_NAME.NAME_CODE ) AS ICRATE_NAME,
[LCLS_CODE], ( SELECT LCLS_NAME FROM M_LCLS WHERE M_LCLS.LCLS_CODE = M.LCLS_CODE ) AS LCLS_NAME,
[MCLS_CODE], ( SELECT MCLS_NAME FROM M_MCLS WHERE M_MCLS.MCLS_CODE = M.MCLS_CODE AND M.LCLS_CODE = M_MCLS.LCLS_CODE ) AS MCLS_NAME,
[MATER_CODE], ( SELECT MATER_NAME FROM M_MATER WHERE M_MATER.MATER_CODE = M.MATER_CODE ) AS MATER_NAME,
[PDMETER_FR], [PDMETER_TO], [LENFR_QTY], [LENTO_QTY], [CONV_QTY], [RATE_QTY], [DEC_PLC], ( SELECT NAME_NAME FROM M_NAME WHERE M_NAME.NAMECLS_CODE = 'DEC_PLC' AND M.DEC_PLC= M_NAME.NAME_CODE
) AS DEC_PLC_NAME, [FRC_TYPE], ( SELECT NAME_NAME FROM M_NAME WHERE M_NAME.NAMECLS_CODE = 'FRC' AND M.FRC_TYPE = M_NAME.NAME_CODE
) AS FRC_NAME,
[USE_FLG],
[ADD_USER], [ADD_PC], [ADD_DATE], [ADD_TIME], [LASTUP_USER], [LASTUP_PC], [LASTUP_DATE], [LASTUP_TIME]
FROM M_INCR AS M
WHERE ICRATE_TYPE = ? AND LCLS_CODE = ? AND MCLS_CODE = ? AND MATER_CODE = ? AND PDMETER_FR = ? AND PDMETER_TO = ? AND LENFR_QTY = ? AND LENTO_QTY = ?
System.M_INCR108:
UPDATE M_INCR SET [CONV_QTY] = ?, [RATE_QTY] = ?, [DEC_PLC] = ?, [FRC_TYPE] = ?, [USE_FLG] = ?,
[LASTUP_USER] = ?, [LASTUP_PC] = ?, [LASTUP_DATE] = ?, [LASTUP_TIME] = ? WHERE ICRATE_TYPE = ? AND LCLS_CODE = ? AND MCLS_CODE = ? AND MATER_CODE = ? AND PDMETER_FR = ? AND PDMETER_TO = ? AND LENFR_QTY = ? AND LENTO_QTY = ?
System.M_INCR109:
SELECT [ICRATE_TYPE] AS [増加率区分タイプ], (SELECT NAME_NAME FROM M_NAME WHERE M_NAME.NAMECLS_CODE = 'ICRATE' AND M.ICRATE_TYPE = M_NAME.NAME_CODE ) AS [増加率区分],
[LCLS_CODE] AS [$LCLS_CODEコード], (SELECT LCLS_NAME FROM M_LCLS WHERE M_LCLS.LCLS_CODE = M.LCLS_CODE ) AS [$LCLS_CODE名],
[MCLS_CODE] AS [$MCLS_CODEコード], (SELECT MCLS_NAME FROM M_MCLS WHERE M_MCLS.MCLS_CODE = M.MCLS_CODE AND M.LCLS_CODE = M_MCLS.LCLS_CODE ) AS [$MCLS_CODE名], [MATER_CODE] AS [材質コード], (SELECT MATER_NAME FROM M_MATER WHERE M_MATER.MATER_CODE = M.MATER_CODE ) AS [材質名], [PDMETER_FR] AS [呼径コード(From)], [PDMETER_TO] AS [呼径コード(To)], [LENFR_QTY] AS [長さ(From)], [LENTO_QTY] AS [長さ(To)], [CONV_QTY] AS [換算本数], [RATE_QTY] AS [増加率], [DEC_PLC] AS [小数処理桁コード], ( SELECT NAME_NAME FROM M_NAME WHERE M_NAME.NAMECLS_CODE = 'DEC_PLC' AND M.DEC_PLC= M_NAME.NAME_CODE
) AS [[小数処理桁名], [FRC_TYPE] AS [端数処理区分], [USE_FLG] AS [使用可否フラグ], [ADD_USER] AS [登録ユーザー名], [ADD_PC] AS [登録ＰＣ名], [ADD_DATE] AS [登録日付], [ADD_TIME] AS [登録時刻], [LASTUP_USER] AS [最終更新ユーザー名], [LASTUP_PC] AS [最終更新ＰＣ名], [LASTUP_DATE] AS [最終更新日付], [LASTUP_TIME] AS [最終更新時刻], (SELECT NAME_NAME FROM M_NAME WHERE M_NAME.NAMECLS_CODE = 'FRC' AND M.FRC_TYPE = M_NAME.NAME_CODE ) AS [端数処理区分] , [USE_FLG] AS [使用可否フラグコード], (SELECT NAME_NAME FROM M_NAME WHERE NAMECLS_CODE = 'USEFLG' AND NAME_CODE = [USE_FLG] ) AS [使用可否フラグ名], [ADD_USER] AS [登録ユーザー名], [ADD_PC] AS [登録PC名], [ADD_DATE] AS [登録日付], [ADD_TIME] AS [登録時刻], [LASTUP_USER] AS [最終更新ユーザー名], [LASTUP_PC] AS [最終更新PC名], [LASTUP_DATE] AS [最終更新日付], [LASTUP_TIME] AS [最終更新時刻] FROM M_INCR AS M
System.M_INCR110:
SELECT [ICRATE_TYPE], ( SELECT NAME_NAME FROM M_NAME WHERE M_NAME.NAMECLS_CODE = 'ICRATE' AND M.ICRATE_TYPE = M_NAME.NAME_CODE ) AS ICRATE_NAME,
[LCLS_CODE], ( SELECT LCLS_NAME FROM M_LCLS WHERE M_LCLS.LCLS_CODE = M.LCLS_CODE ) AS LCLS_NAME,
[MCLS_CODE], ( SELECT MCLS_NAME FROM M_MCLS WHERE M_MCLS.MCLS_CODE = M.MCLS_CODE AND M.LCLS_CODE = M_MCLS.LCLS_CODE ) AS MCLS_NAME,
[MATER_CODE], ( SELECT MATER_NAME FROM M_MATER WHERE M_MATER.MATER_CODE = M.MATER_CODE ) AS MATER_NAME,
[PDMETER_FR], [PDMETER_TO], [LENFR_QTY], [LENTO_QTY], [CONV_QTY], [RATE_QTY], [DEC_PLC], ( SELECT NAME_NAME FROM M_NAME WHERE M_NAME.NAMECLS_CODE = 'DEC_PLC' AND M.DEC_PLC= M_NAME.NAME_CODE
) AS DEC_PLC_NAME,
[FRC_TYPE], ( SELECT NAME_NAME FROM M_NAME WHERE M_NAME.NAMECLS_CODE = 'FRC' AND M.FRC_TYPE = M_NAME.NAME_CODE
) AS FRC_NAME,
[USE_FLG],
[ADD_USER], [ADD_PC], [ADD_DATE], [ADD_TIME], [LASTUP_USER], [LASTUP_PC], [LASTUP_DATE], [LASTUP_TIME]
FROM M_INCR AS M
WHERE ICRATE_TYPE = ? AND LCLS_CODE = ? AND MCLS_CODE = ? AND MATER_CODE = ? AND PDMETER_FR = ? AND PDMETER_TO = ?
